title: Bei Bei Xiong Lixian Ji
synopsis: A group of polar bears who lost their homes, according to the legend of their ancestors, found the pure island of the North Pole. The venerable of the Beibei family and the grandfather of Beibei, decided to lead everyone to find the legendary ice diamond. It is said that only the energy of the ice diamond is released , You can save the earth and bring the earth’s climate environment back to the previous normal level. Thus, a journey of finding ice diamonds began. As the inheritor of the polar bear family, Beibei bears the role of pioneer in every exploration. Purity Island is the last land in the Arctic. It is surrounded by icebergs, and there are mysterious plants in the middle. In the process of searching for ice drills, they encountered various animals and had conflicts with them to varying degrees. So much misunderstanding each other. Whether it is an enemy or a friend, everyone gradually understands in the friction... (translated from iqiyi)
